courses.name: C
courses.desc: We start from scratch and end up to creating more complex programs like ones using threads or graphical interface in ncurses for instance.

courses.name: Java
courses.desc: Learn java and Oriented-object programming. We also dig into JavaFX, Swing and AWT, Libgdx and lwjgl3.

courses.name: Linux
courses.desc: Learn how to survive in (or mastering) a linux-based environment.

courses.name: Assembly
courses.desc: Introduction to assembly, ARM to be precise.

courses.name: Cyber security
courses.desc: What we know about cyber security.

courses.name: SQL
courses.desc: Course about SQL, PL/SQL and PGSQL. You will also learn a bit about NoSQL Database with Cypher.

courses.name: OCaml
courses.desc: Here you will learn about OCaml and functional languages.

courses.name: HTML and CSS
courses.desc: Learn how to use html and css to create a simple website.

courses.name: JS, TS and Node
courses.desc: Learn how to use javascript or typescript. You can even learn more about Node.js and modules like electron.

courses.name: PHP
courses.desc: Learn how complex, weird and vast PHP is, and a bit about framework PHP.
